message.content:
cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.SE, cs.FL, cs.SC 

The paper deals with termination analysis of logic programs with arithmetic predicates, which falls under the area of programming languages (cs.PL). The paper also mentions the use of abstract interpretation, which is a technique commonly used in formal methods and logic (cs.LO). The paper proposes a new method for termination analysis, which can be seen as a software engineering problem (cs.SE). The paper also mentions the use of query-mapping pairs, which is a technique used in formal verification and model checking (cs.FL). Finally, the paper deals with the termination of programs, which is a topic in the area of software correctness (cs.SC).
